data.name: KISS: K-pop Idol StorieS - Road to Debut
data.detailed_description:
KISS is a love letter to the exciting world of K-pop.

In this Life Simulation, you're the mighty manager who scouts for talent, manages their schedule, makes their budget, plans their social media, picks their music & their fashion!

Debut the next hit K-pop idol group!


    Find up to 5 trainees

  • Find up to 5 trainees with their own characteristics and backstories.
    Do you pick the sassy bad girl who drives fans wild but might destroy the group,
    or go with the shy song bird who needs a bit more encouragement before she is ready to be on stage?
    In this game you listen to them sing, understand their personality, find their strengths and empower them!
    Assembling a diverse group of idols depends on you!


    Original K-pop soundtrack


  • Original K-pop soundtrack.
    Choose your group’s debut single which has been produced by a professional Korean musician exclusively for this game.


    Your choices matter


  • Your choices matter.
    The ending depends on how well you manage your group.
    A member’s parents were in an accident before the big show, do you tell her now or keep it secret until after the performance.
    The choice is yours.




    Plan their schedules with over 120 different activities.
    Should you send your idols to intense dance practice or give them the night off with a relaxing yoga class.
    Your choices will impact the team's growth, budget, and behavior.

data.short_description: KISS is a love letter to the exciting world of K-pop! In this Life Simulator,you're the mighty manager who scouts for talent, manages their schedule, makes their budget, plans their social media, picks their music & their fashion! Debut the next hit K-pop idol group!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
